EmailTemplate.name: Budget Upload Rejection
EmailTemplate.subject: Budget Upload has been rejected
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!FileBatch__c.FirstApprover__c}, The budget upload for {!FileBatch__c.ExternalFileName__c}, {!FileBatch__c.RecordTypeName__c}, {!FileBatch__c.FiscalYear__c} has been rejected. Please review the batch rejection comments.
UtahGrants
Sincerely,
UtahGrants Support Team
